appName: Balloon Toss - Keep the Balloon Up
displayName: Balloon Toss - Keep the Balloon Up
display_name: Balloon Toss - Keep the Balloon Up
display_long_description:
Love playing with balloons?

Balloon Toss is the ultimate fun-loaded balloon game app that will keep you on a challenging track. Enjoy the all-new virtual theme of playing with balloons. Choose your theme and game level to enter the playing area. It's easy to play, but acquiring the master level might be difficult. 

The core challenge in this balloon game is to keep the balloon in the air as long as you can. Keep hitting the balloon upwards, and the game score will get higher. Once the balloon falls, the game is over. Sounds interesting? Accept the challenge. 

This balloon hitting game is highly addictive and will keep your eyes glued to the screen. Play the game in your free time and let your mind refresh. 

Key Features:
- Single user play mode
- Hand-tracking playing approach
- Mixed Reality: Experience the realistic themes and real-world environment
- Multiple supported player modes like sitting, standing, and roomscale 
- Supports offline play
- VR remote control to guide you in the correct direction
- Experience your desired theme by choosing from multiple theme options
- Three playing levels - Easy, Medium and Hard
- Scoreboard to check your progress


Recall your childhood memories in an all-new technical era.
Can you make the highest score? Let's check how long you can keep the balloon up.
Give it a try!
